# [Interview #474: TGS Signing Report - Katie Frey, Entry #11](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=474#11)

#### Question

When will we see
*The Way of Kings*
?

#### Brandon Sanderson

"I'll be posting more about it in 2010; this year is for WoT." He expects it to be available around September 2010.
